name: Mini Gold Coop
description:
"Mini Golf Coop" is an indie game, in which you can play alone, or in local coop, to a new version of Mini Golf.

This game is a really simple game, the controls are really simple, but it is still enjoyable.
There are plentty of maps to choose, and the aim is to get to the hole the fastest posible.
In the coop option, the game is a turn based game.

What to expect:

-Minimalist graphic style.

-Relaxing gameplay.

-A lot of fun in local coop.

How to play:

-Use the mouse to aim and the left mouse click to hit the ball.
